text: Arau tomalokara naraisakalara majata yiye byabhicara karae sihamtara biraud'dhe tomalokara majara paraa caraijana saksi talaba karaa. Yadi sihamte saksi diye tente sihamtaka (naraisakalaka) gharata araraud'dha karai rakha yetiya laike sihamtara mrtyu nahaya athaba allahe sihamtara babe ana kono byarastha karai nidiye
